description: TableColumnDefinition contains information about a column returned in the Table.

description.description: A human readable description of this column

format.description: An optional OpenAPI type modifier for this column. A format modifies the `type` and imposes additional rules, like date or time formatting for a string. The `name` format is applied to the primary identifier column which has type `"string"` to assist in clients identifying column is the resource name.

name.description: A human readable name for the column.

priority.description: An integer defining the relative importance of this column compared to others. Lower numbers are considered higher priority. Columns that may be omitted in limited space scenarios should be given a higher priority.

type.description: An OpenAPI type definition for this column, such as `"number", `"integer"`, `"string"`, or `"array"`.
